ApproxsimClient.evolver
Interface ServerSession

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultServerSession
public interface ServerSession

Defines the calls the SimulationEvolver exepects to make to a server.

Method Summary
 void close()
          Closes the session.
 void initialize(ApproxsimObject root)
          Initializes the session with the provided ApproxsimObject as root.
 void open()
          Opens the session.
 void registerSubscription(Subscription subscription)
          Registers the provided subscription
 void send(ApproxsimMessage message)
          The send method used by this session.
 void step()
          Tries to take an attached step.
 void updateObject(Reference reference, ApproxsimObject object)
          Updates the reference with the provided object
 

Method Detail

registerSubscription

void registerSubscription(Subscription subscription)
                          throws ServerException
Registers the provided subscription

Parameters:
subscription - the subscription to register
Throws:
ServerException

initialize

void initialize(ApproxsimObject root)
                throws ServerException
Initializes the session with the provided ApproxsimObject as root.

Parameters:
root - the object to use as root
Throws:
ServerException - on communication error.

close

void close()
           throws ServerException
Closes the session. Note that it is an error to call any function after the session has been close()'ed.

Throws:
ServerException - on communication error.

open

void open()
          throws ServerException
Opens the session. Note that is an error to call open on an already open()'ed session.

Throws:
ServerException - on communication error.

step

void step()
          throws ServerException
Tries to take an attached step.

Throws:
ServerException - on communication error.

updateObject

void updateObject(Reference reference,
                  ApproxsimObject object)
                  throws ServerException
Updates the reference with the provided object

Parameters:
reference - a reference to the position to update.
object - the update to update with.
Throws:
ServerException - on communication error.

send

void send(ApproxsimMessage message)
          throws ServerException
The send method used by this session.

Parameters:
message - the message to send.
Throws:
ServerException - on communication error.
